headings.usage: Main headlines, section titles. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI elements, data. High legibility.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire body background to prevent banding and add film grain feel.

layout_strategy.grid_system: The Tetris Grid (Mode A) for Gallery. Asymmetric 12-col grid.

buttons.primary: bg-white text-black hover:bg-gray-200 rounded-none px-8 py-4 font-bold tracking-wide uppercase text-sm transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:border-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-none px-8 py-4 font-bold tracking-wide uppercase text-sm transition-all duration-300

cards.style: bg-surface border border-border_subtle hover:border-accent_primary/50 transition-colors duration-500 group relative overflow-hidden

inputs.style: bg-surface_highlight border-border_subtle focus:border-accent_primary rounded-none h-14 px-4 text-white placeholder:text-white/20 transition-all

motion.entrance: Staggered fade-up for text. Scale-out for images.
motion.interactions: Hover: Text tracking expands slightly. Images scale 1.05x.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: `npm install framer-motion lenis @studio-freight/react-lenis lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge`
2. SETUP FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to `index.css` immediately.
3. GLOBAL CSS: Set `body { background-color: #030303; color: #EDEDED; }` in `index.css`. Remove any default white backgrounds.
4. HERO SECTION: Must use the `hero_bg` image with a heavy dark overlay. Text should be 'Syne', huge (text-6xl md:text-8xl), and centered or left-aligned with dramatic fade-in.
5. NAVIGATION: Floating glass navbar. `backdrop-blur-md bg-black/50 border-b border-white/10`.
6. FORMS: Use Shadcn components but override the rounded corners to `rounded-none` and borders to `border-white/10`.
7. GALLERY: Implement the 'Tetris Grid' using CSS Grid. Some items span 2 cols, some 1.
8. NOISE: Add a fixed position div with a noise background image (base64 or url) at z-index 50 with pointer-events-none and opacity 0.05.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid dark colors.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Use 'Syne' for all headings and 'Manrope' for body.
Dark mode is the ONLY mode.
